title: Merge up Solr MapReduce contrib code to latest external changes.
description: There are a variety of changes in the mapreduce contrib code that have occurred while getting the initial stuff committed - they need to be merged in.

comments.author: Mark Miller
comments.content:
I looked through the tests and didn't find any pertinent changes a while back. I'm going to commit these (generally minor bug fixes) so that I can get them in 4.7.1.

I'll make a new issues to do a check on the dependencies.
